name: generate_mermaid_diagram
description:
Generate mermaid diagram and chart with mermaid syntax dynamically. Mermaid is a JavaScript based diagramming and charting tool that uses Markdown-inspired text definitions and a renderer to create and modify complex diagrams. Syntax tips: quote labels containing special characters, e.g. B["Label text"], and use
for line breaks.

theme.description: Theme for the diagram (optional). Default is 'default'.

backgroundColor.description: Background color for the diagram (optional). Default is 'white'.

outputType.description: The output type of the diagram. Default is 'base64'. Recommended: 'file' (saves PNG to disk for easy viewing). 'base64' returns PNG as a base64 encoded string. 'svg' returns SVG markup. 'mermaid' returns the raw Mermaid syntax. 'svg_url' and 'png_url' return public mermaid.ink links for sharing.
